short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Select text on the page and search it with ChatGPT. You can also add instructions for what ChatGPT should do with this text.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Select text on the page and search it with ChatGPT.

How to use:
1. Select any text on the page.
2. Right-click the selected text.
3. Choose the "Search with ChatGPT" option.

Provide specific instructions for how ChatGPT should process the selected text.

How to use with instructions:
1. Click the extension icon in the top bar.
2. Provide instructions for ChatGPT.
3. Select any text on the page.
4. Right-click the selected text.
5. Choose an option from the "Search with ChatGPT" menu.
